MEMORY_STATISTICS_VALID_CONFIG.desc: Configuring memory statistics with valid values.

MEMORY_STATISTICS_WITH_INVALID_SAMPLING_.desc: Configuring memory statistics with an invalid sampling_interval ( out of acceptable range).

MEMORY_STATISTICS_WITH_INVALID_RETENTION.desc: Configuring memory statistics with an invalid retention_period (out of acceptable range).

MEMORY_STATISTICS_WITH_ENABLE_FEATURE.desc: Enabling memory statistics feature with valid values.
